title: Blogger VS Word Press ?
content:
And is there a way to import content from one to the other?

 [‹ Google logotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010029/http:/typophile.com/node/42235 "Go to previous forum topic") [The future of typography ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010029/http:/typophile.com/node/42112 "Go to next forum topic")
author: russellm

comments.content:
I’ve used both and am a much bigger fan of WordPress, and yes, you can export your blog from blogger and import it into WordPress. That’s what I did.

——  
Kenny Eicher  
CreativeJournal.net

OK, i found where to do it.

Thanks.

-=®=-

[I am loving WordPress, as well.](http://web.archive.org/web/20081002010029/http:/for.ma/blog)  
_(But, I previously had a hosted .blogspot blogger blog, which was okay too, I guess. ;)_

Dav(id)
